questions.question: What is the primary color dominating the packaging's design?
What shape best describes the overall product packaging?
What material appears to be used for the product's outer packaging?
What is the most prominent text color on the packaging?
What is the text mostly referring to, according to the visuals?
Judging by the visual presentation, what is the product's likely form?
Describing the texture, what kind of finish does the packaging suggest?
Are there any noticeable graphical elements aside from text?
Considering the packaging size, would you say it is a bulk or single-serving?
What language(s) are predominantly used on the packaging?
Does the packaging feature any images or illustrations?
What weight, in grams, is specified on the packaging?
How many individual units seem to be contained within the package?
What secondary color is used to complement the primary color?
Does the packaging indicate the product's net weight per unit?
